fallback.header: This website provides EU citizens a way to provisionally ‘opt-out’ from the EHDS
fallback.intro: Our mission is provide all EU citizens with a means to object to being registred in the European Health Data Space (EHDS). Please in by clicking <red>"Select Country"</red>  if it is available for your country or checkout the the <red>"about"</red> button  for more info.

p.0: NL h2 opt me out   text

step1.title: With European Health Data Space (EHDS) you will lose control over who can access your medical records.
step1.intro: Your data can be used by researchers, governments, and commercial companies. You can object to this with an <red>‘opt-out’</red>, for the two ways your data can be used.

disclaimer.p: 50 words Curabitur malesuada purus vel erat pharetra a placerat nibh facilisis. Phasellus gravida libero vitae nisi aliquam pharetra. Quisque dignissim justo sit amet odio consequat laoreet. Morbi blandit, nisi sit amet egestas ullamcorper, enim leo placerat sapien, eu egestas enim neque at mauris. Nulla facilisi. In non ligula. Nulla facilisi ligula.

step2.intro: NL Who is your general practitioner? *

step3.title: NL Your details
step3.intro: Your data is used for this process only stored only temporarily. See our privacy policy for more info.

senderId.label: Last four digits of your BSN *

step4.title: Your OptOut
step4.intro: Since there is no way to deliver this digitally (yet), we deliver by post. Proven technology.

letter.subject: OptOut for the European Health DataSpace (EHDS)
letter.title: Mr, Ms,
letter.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vel sem ex. Curabitur finibus augue purus, eget pharetra turpis convallis ac. Pellentesque efficitur elementum bibendum. Cras pretium risus eu rutrum dictum. Nam tristique sapien nulla, eu euismod enim vehicula in. Sed tempus dui finibus urna porttitor tempor. Proin nunc risus, aliquam in libero quis, accumsan feugiat arcu. Nam ut semper leo. Nulla facilisi. Maecenas commodo varius mauris, dignissim ullamcorper purus pellentesque quis. Etiam sit amet mi sit amet purus feugiat pretium.

receiveACopy.title: Receive a copy
receiveACopy.text: You will receive instructions on how to reverse your opt-out.

donate.title: Donate
donate.text: We are an NGO and run non-profit. Please pay from an account that is in your name, since this is also used for identification. You can only OptYourselfOut.

paymentOptions.1: Feel free, if you can't afford more.
paymentOptions.3: Pay it forward, donate a letter.
paymentOptions.4: Support this app. We work non-profit!

step5.title: What happens now?
step5.intro: Your letter is processed by the Dutch company <red>Pingen</red>. They will deliver it to

stayInformed.title: Stay informed
stayInformed.text: Stay informed (English) of legislative changes that might affect your opt-out.

notification.title: Help others with their privacy too!
notification.text: If you found this service useful, please share our website with your friends family or anyone who might benefit from it.
